Sql.query:
insert into trn_trans_entrega_detalle (tentcodi,tentdecodi,tentdeversion, tentdedia,tentdepromediodia,tentdesumadia, tentde1,tentde2,tentde3,tentde4,tentde5, tentde6,tentde7,tentde8,tentde9,tentde10,
tentde11,tentde12,tentde13,tentde14,tentde15, tentde16,tentde17,tentde18,tentde19,tentde20,
tentde21,tentde22,tentde23,tentde24,tentde25, tentde26,tentde27,tentde28,tentde29,tentde30,
tentde31,tentde32,tentde33,tentde34,tentde35, tentde36,tentde37,tentde38,tentde39,tentde40,
tentde41,tentde42,tentde43,tentde44,tentde45, tentde46,tentde47,tentde48,tentde49,tentde50,
tentde51,tentde52,tentde53,tentde54,tentde55, tentde56,tentde57,tentde58,tentde59,tentde60,
tentde61,tentde62,tentde63,tentde64,tentde65, tentde66,tentde67,tentde68,tentde69,tentde70,
tentde71,tentde72,tentde73,tentde74,tentde75, tentde76,tentde77,tentde78,tentde79,tentde80,
tentde81,tentde82,tentde83,tentde84,tentde85, tentde86,tentde87,tentde88,tentde89,tentde90,
tentde91,tentde92,tentde93,tentde94,tentde95, tentde96,tentdeusername,tentdefecins
)values ( :tentcodi,:tentdecodi,:tentdeversion,:tentdedia,:tentdepromediodia,:tentdesumadia, :tentde1,:tentde2,:tentde3,:tentde4,:tentde5, :tentde6,:tentde7,:tentde8,:tentde9,:tentde10,
:tentde11,:tentde12,:tentde13,:tentde14,:tentde15, :tentde16,:tentde17,:tentde18,:tentde19,:tentde20,
:tentde21,:tentde22,:tentde23,:tentde24,:tentde25, :tentde26,:tentde27,:tentde28,:tentde29,:tentde30,
:tentde31,:tentde32,:tentde33,:tentde34,:tentde35, :tentde36,:tentde37,:tentde38,:tentde39,:tentde40,
:tentde41,:tentde42,:tentde43,:tentde44,:tentde45, :tentde46,:tentde47,:tentde48,:tentde49,:tentde50,
:tentde51,:tentde52,:tentde53,:tentde54,:tentde55, :tentde56,:tentde57,:tentde58,:tentde59,:tentde60,
:tentde61,:tentde62,:tentde63,:tentde64,:tentde65, :tentde66,:tentde67,:tentde68,:tentde69,:tentde70,
:tentde71,:tentde72,:tentde73,:tentde74,:tentde75, :tentde76,:tentde77,:tentde78,:tentde79,:tentde80,
:tentde81,:tentde82,:tentde83,:tentde84,:tentde85, :tentde86,:tentde87,:tentde88,:tentde89,:tentde90,
:tentde91,:tentde92,:tentde93,:tentde94,:tentde95, :tentde96,:tentdeusername,:tentdefecins )
delete from trn_trans_entrega_detalle where tentcodi in (select tentcodi from trn_trans_entrega where pericodi = :pericodi and tentversion = :tentversion and tentcodigo = :tentcodigo)
delete from trn_trans_entrega_detalle where tentcodi in (select tentcodi from trn_trans_entrega where pericodi = :pericodi and tentversion = :tentversion )
select tentcodigo from trn_trans_entrega where tentestado = 'ACT' and (emprcodi = :emprcodi ) and (pericodi= :pericodi or :pericodi is null) order by tentcodigo asc

select * from trn_trans_entrega_detalle a join trn_trans_entrega b on tentestado = 'ACT' and a.tentcodi=b.tentcodi and a.tentdeversion = b.tentversion where (b.emprcodi = :emprcodi or :emprcodi = 0) and (b.pericodi= :pericodi or :pericodi is null) and (b.tentcodigo = :tentcodigo or :tentcodigo is null) and (b.tentversion = :tentversion or :tentversion is null) order by a.tentdedia asc
select emprcodi,barrcodi,tentcodigo,equicodi,pericodi,tentversion,tenttipoinformacion from trn_trans_entrega where tentestado = 'ACT' and pericodi = :pericodi and tentversion = :tentversion

select barrcodi, nombbarra, tentcodigo, empresa as tenttipoinformacion, cliente as tentdeusername, energia from( select te.pericodi, te.barrcodi, (select barrbarratransferencia from trn_barra b where b.barrcodi=te.barrcodi) as nombbarra, te.tentcodigo, (select e.emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi=te.emprcodi) as empresa, (select e.equinomb from vw_eq_central_generacion e where e.equicodi=te.equicodi) as cliente, sum(d.tentdesumadia) as energia from trn_trans_entrega te join trn_trans_entrega_detalle d on te.tentcodi=d.tentcodi where te.tentestado = 'ACT' and (te.pericodi=:pericodi or :pericodi is null) and (te.tentversion=:tentversion or :tentversion is null ) and (te.barrcodi=:barrcodi or :barrcodi is null) and (te.emprcodi=:emprcodi or :emprcodi is null) group by te.pericodi, te.barrcodi, te.tentcodigo, te.emprcodi, te.equicodi union select r.pericodi, r.barrcodi, (select barrbarratransferencia from trn_barra b where b.barrcodi=r.barrcodi) as nombbarra, r.tretcodigo, (select e.emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi=r.genemprcodi) as empresa, (select e.emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi=r.cliemprcodi) as cliente, sum(rd.tretdesumadia) as energia from trn_trans_retiro r join trn_trans_retiro_detalle rd on r.tretcodi=rd.tretcodi where r.tretestado = 'ACT' and (r.pericodi=:pericodi or :pericodi is null) and (r.tretversion=:tretversion or :tretversion is null) and (r.barrcodi=:barrcodi or :barrcodi is null) and (r.genemprcodi=:emprcodi or :emprcodi is null) group by r.pericodi, r.barrcodi, r.tretcodigo, r.genemprcodi, r.cliemprcodi )t order by nombbarra, tentcodigo, tenttipoinformacion, cliente, energia
select * from trn_trans_entrega_detalle where tentcodi = :tentcodi and (tentdeversion = :tentdeversion or :tentdeversion is null) order by tentdedia asc

select t.* from ( select ed.*,te.tentcodigo,'E' as Tipo,te.tenttipoinformacion as tipoinformacion,b.emprnomb from trn_trans_entrega_detalle ed join trn_trans_entrega te on ed.tentcodi=te.tentcodi join vw_trn_empresa_str b on te.emprcodi = b.emprcodi where te.tentestado = 'ACT' and (te.emprcodi = :emprcodi or :emprcodi = 0) and (te.barrcodi = :barrcodi or :barrcodi = 0) and te.pericodi= :pericodi and te.tentversion = :tentversion union select rd.*,tr.tretcodigo,'R' as Tipo,tr.trettipoinformacion as tipoinformacion,b.emprnomb from trn_trans_retiro_detalle rd join trn_trans_retiro tr on rd.tretcodi=tr.tretcodi join vw_trn_empresa_str b on tr.genemprcodi = b.emprcodi where tr.tretestado = 'ACT' and (tr.genemprcodi = :emprcodi or :emprcodi = 0) and (tr.barrcodi = :barrcodi or :barrcodi = 0) and tr.pericodi= :pericodi and tr.tretversion = :tentversion ) t where (t.Tipo= :flag or :flag is null) order by t.Tipo,t.emprnomb,t.tentcodigo,t.tentdedia asc

select tentcodigo from trn_trans_entrega where tentestado = 'ACT' and pericodi = :pericodi and emprcodi = :emprcodi and tentversion = :recacodi union select tretcodigo as tentcodigo from trn_trans_retiro where tretestado = 'ACT' and pericodi = :pericodi and genemprcodi = :emprcodi and tretversion = :recacodi order by 1 desc

SELECT te.emprcodi, si.emprnomb, te.barrcodi, tb.barrnombre, ted.* FROM trn_trans_entrega_detalle ted inner join trn_trans_entrega te ON te.tentcodi = ted.tentcodi inner join trn_barra tb ON tb.barrcodi=te.barrcodi left join si_empresa si ON si.emprcodi = te.emprcodi WHERE te.tentestado = 'ACT' and te.pericodi = {0} AND te.tentversion = {1}

select tte.TENTCODI, tte.PERICODI, tte.TENTVERSION, ted.TENTDEDIA, ted.TENTDE1, ted.TENTDE2, ted.TENTDE3, ted.TENTDE4, ted.TENTDE5, ted.TENTDE6, ted.TENTDE7, ted.TENTDE8, ted.TENTDE9, ted.TENTDE10, ted.TENTDE11, ted.TENTDE12, ted.TENTDE13, ted.TENTDE14, ted.TENTDE15, ted.TENTDE16, ted.TENTDE17, ted.TENTDE18, ted.TENTDE19, ted.TENTDE20, ted.TENTDE21, ted.TENTDE22, ted.TENTDE23, ted.TENTDE24, ted.TENTDE25, ted.TENTDE26, ted.TENTDE27, ted.TENTDE28, ted.TENTDE29, ted.TENTDE30, ted.TENTDE31, ted.TENTDE32, ted.TENTDE33, ted.TENTDE34, ted.TENTDE35, ted.TENTDE36, ted.TENTDE37, ted.TENTDE38, ted.TENTDE39, ted.TENTDE40, ted.TENTDE41, ted.TENTDE42, ted.TENTDE43, ted.TENTDE44, ted.TENTDE45, ted.TENTDE46, ted.TENTDE47, ted.TENTDE48, ted.TENTDE49, ted.TENTDE50, ted.TENTDE51, ted.TENTDE52, ted.TENTDE53, ted.TENTDE54, ted.TENTDE55, ted.TENTDE56, ted.TENTDE57, ted.TENTDE58, ted.TENTDE59, ted.TENTDE60, ted.TENTDE61, ted.TENTDE62, ted.TENTDE63, ted.TENTDE64, ted.TENTDE65, ted.TENTDE66, ted.TENTDE67, ted.TENTDE68, ted.TENTDE69, ted.TENTDE70, ted.TENTDE71, ted.TENTDE72, ted.TENTDE73, ted.TENTDE74, ted.TENTDE75, ted.TENTDE76, ted.TENTDE77, ted.TENTDE78, ted.TENTDE79, ted.TENTDE80, ted.TENTDE81, ted.TENTDE82, ted.TENTDE83, ted.TENTDE84, ted.TENTDE85, ted.TENTDE86, ted.TENTDE87, ted.TENTDE88, ted.TENTDE89, ted.TENTDE90, ted.TENTDE91, ted.TENTDE92, ted.TENTDE93, ted.TENTDE94, ted.TENTDE95, ted.TENTDE96 from trn_trans_entrega tte inner join trn_trans_entrega_detalle ted on tte.CODENTCODI=ted.TENTCODI where tte.pericodi =:PERICODI and tte.tentversion =: TENTVERSION and tte.TENTCODIGO=: TENTCODIGO and ted.TENTDEDIA=: TENTDEDIA

select tte.TENTCODI, tte.PERICODI, tte.TENTVERSION, ted.TENTDEDIA, ted.TENTDE1, ted.TENTDE2, ted.TENTDE3, ted.TENTDE4, ted.TENTDE5, ted.TENTDE6, ted.TENTDE7, ted.TENTDE8, ted.TENTDE9, ted.TENTDE10, ted.TENTDE11, ted.TENTDE12, ted.TENTDE13, ted.TENTDE14, ted.TENTDE15, ted.TENTDE16, ted.TENTDE17, ted.TENTDE18, ted.TENTDE19, ted.TENTDE20, ted.TENTDE21, ted.TENTDE22, ted.TENTDE23, ted.TENTDE24, ted.TENTDE25, ted.TENTDE26, ted.TENTDE27, ted.TENTDE28, ted.TENTDE29, ted.TENTDE30, ted.TENTDE31, ted.TENTDE32, ted.TENTDE33, ted.TENTDE34, ted.TENTDE35, ted.TENTDE36, ted.TENTDE37, ted.TENTDE38, ted.TENTDE39, ted.TENTDE40, ted.TENTDE41, ted.TENTDE42, ted.TENTDE43, ted.TENTDE44, ted.TENTDE45, ted.TENTDE46, ted.TENTDE47, ted.TENTDE48, ted.TENTDE49, ted.TENTDE50, ted.TENTDE51, ted.TENTDE52, ted.TENTDE53, ted.TENTDE54, ted.TENTDE55, ted.TENTDE56, ted.TENTDE57, ted.TENTDE58, ted.TENTDE59, ted.TENTDE60, ted.TENTDE61, ted.TENTDE62, ted.TENTDE63, ted.TENTDE64, ted.TENTDE65, ted.TENTDE66, ted.TENTDE67, ted.TENTDE68, ted.TENTDE69, ted.TENTDE70, ted.TENTDE71, ted.TENTDE72, ted.TENTDE73, ted.TENTDE74, ted.TENTDE75, ted.TENTDE76, ted.TENTDE77, ted.TENTDE78, ted.TENTDE79, ted.TENTDE80, ted.TENTDE81, ted.TENTDE82, ted.TENTDE83, ted.TENTDE84, ted.TENTDE85, ted.TENTDE86, ted.TENTDE87, ted.TENTDE88, ted.TENTDE89, ted.TENTDE90, ted.TENTDE91, ted.TENTDE92, ted.TENTDE93, ted.TENTDE94, ted.TENTDE95, (SELECT TENTDE96 FROM trn_trans_entrega_detalle WHERE TENTCODI=ted.TENTCODI AND TENTDEDIA = ted.TENTDEDIA - 1) TENTDE96 from trn_trans_entrega tte inner join trn_trans_entrega_detalle ted on tte.CODENTCODI=ted.TENTCODI where tte.pericodi =:PERICODI and tte.tentversion =: TENTVERSION and tte.TENTCODIGO=: TENTCODIGO and ted.TENTDEDIA=: TENTDEDIA AND tte.trnenvcodi = ( select t.trnenvcodi from ( select tt.*, row_number() over (order by trnenvcodi desc) as rn from trn_envio tt where pericodi = :PERICODI and recacodi = : TENTVERSION and emprcodi = :EMPRCODI and trnenvtipinf = 'ER' )t where t.rn = 1)
